name: Mr. Unreal
description:
Take control of Mr Unreal, pass through the puzzles, complete the path to the boss and defeat rim! 

The Giant Rubisk's cube

In this platform world, every color has a meaning.

When you step on, you become the platform color and receive the corresponding power, use it wisely.

Supports mouse, keyboard and controller

The Powers :)

  • Dash            - Shift L
  • Slow            -      E     
  • Impulse       -  Right Click
  • Fast Fall      - Left Click  / C

This project is in development, i'm working on some puzzles but the world is ready to get in. I left the door of the boss open, try it. 

*   Press  (Ç) to randomize the boss's colors   * 

I will keep updating the game until the final version and i'm open to new ideas to keep improving.

Updating !

by ig @HercilioMaia
